summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Engineer to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund of the City of Seattle in the sum of two thousand three hundred thirty-six and 71/100 ($2336.71) dollars, on account of the cost and expense of the improvement of Second Avenue West et al, by paving the same, as provided for in Ordinance No. 20387, creating Local Improvement District No. 1982.
